name: Gachimuchi: Become Dungeon Master
description:
♂"ASS WE CAN!"♂ — Billy Herrington

The nameless hero begins to have gachi dreams and gets into the most unforgettable adventure of his life.

In this novel, you will find:
4 endings,
atmospheric pastime in the bar with Billy,
a confusing but interesting plot,
a gachi gallery with 6 posters that can be opened as you progress (one poster is a bonus),
a delusional Gachimuchi knowledge test,
the best ever gym battle,
a lot of music (not only gachi remixes),
one exclusive gachi mix made specifically for this novel from the musical group Eroguro,
beautiful sprites of characters and backgrounds.
...pleasant dreams to you! giggling

Localizations: Russian and English. (change in game settings)

All information about the resources used and links to them can be found in the game itself, in the "About" tab.

Disclaimer:
The plot in this game is ♂fantasies♂ (fiction) of its author. All fictional characters that match real people are an accident. (can anime-style characters even look like real people?)

There is obscene language! By launching this ♂gachi♂ novel, you confirm that you have reached the age of majority.

Thanks:
Huge, HUGE thanks to the ♂amazing♂ musical group Eroguro for the gachi mix made especially for this novel.

Many thanks to all those who make free software and materials for creating something. Thanks!

Thanks to the Ren'Py community both on VKontakte and in the rest of the Internet.

Thanks to the commentator in the VKontakte group on Ren'Py for the code of the test work. Without you, this part of my novel would simply not exist.

♂♂♂
